/usr/bin/g++  -lgomp -lpthread CMakeFiles/hello_devices.exe.dir/hello_devices.cpp.o -o hello_devices.exe  /usr/local/cuda-12.4/lib64/libcudart.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libcuda.so -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl  -L"/usr/local/cuda-12.4/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs" -L"/usr/local/cuda-12.4/targets/x86_64-linux/lib"
